docs.summary: Integrate payment processing to your checkout, with a wide range of payment providers

params.name: country
params.doc: The country in which the merchant will provide their services, in [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) format.

params.name: mode
params.doc: Connection mode. Identifies whether an account is live or for testing purposes.

params.name: credentials
params.doc: Set of key-value pairs. Free format of the fields that describes merchant credentials for Payment Provider. The format must be specified in  [Wix DevCenter](https://dev.wix.com/) beforehand or notified manually. It will be filled by merchant according to JSON schema during onboarding process and will be passed to Payment Provider as is.

docs.summary:
This SPI will be triggered when a merchant provides the required data to connect a payment provider account to their
Wix site. This allows you to verify the merchant's credentials as provided to Wix, and confirm that the merchant is registered to your service.

params.name: merchantCredentials
params.doc: Set of key-value pairs. Payment Provider own credentials that were connected during the onboarding process.

params.name: paymentMethod
params.doc:
Payment method supported by the payment provider.
These values will be displayed to the end-user upon checkout and will be passed to the payment provider to understand what payment method a user selected on the Wix side.
In case `paymentMethod:creditCard` field `paymentMethodData` will be initialized with `card`data.

params.name: mode
params.doc: Connection mode. Identifies whether an account is live or for testing purposes.

params.name: paymentMethodData
params.doc:
Payment method data information. Currently this data will be accessible in case `paymentMethod` equals to `creditCard`.
Please note that this call initiated in case you added *creditCard* as a payment method at [DevCenter](https://dev.wix.com).

docs.summary:
This SPI will be triggered when a transaction is recorded in Wix. Initiate payment upon receipt of this SPI.
Make sure to use the wixTransactionId parameter as an idempotency key, as Wix will retry the call in case of failure.

params.name: merchantCredentials
params.doc: Set of key-value pairs. Payment Provider own credentials that were connected during the onboarding process.

params.name: reason
params.doc: Reason for refund. Defined by the merchant.

params.name: mode
params.doc: Transaction mode. Identifies whether an account is live or for testing purposes.

params.name: refundAmount
params.doc:
Total amount to pay in a currency’s smallest unit. In the example it's a $10.00 payment.
The amount includes all extra charges that are described in the order object like shipping, taxes, etc.

docs.summary:
The call from the Wix server should initiate a payment refund process on the provider's side.
It must be idempotent, so that if a conncection is lost, Wix platform will retry the same call with the same parameters.
The `wixRefundId` parameter must be used as an idempotent key in order to identify the call invocation.

response:
{
  "pluginRefundId": "R_e89b-12d3-a456-42665",
  "reasonCode": 3012,
  "errorCode": "PROVIDER_ERROR_CODE",
  "errorMessage": "Insufficient funds for refund. Please contact our support to resolve it manually.",
  "status": "DECLINED"
}

docs.summary: Set of key-value pairs. Free format of the fields that describes merchant credentials for Payment Provider. The format must be specified in  [Wix DevCenter](https://dev.wix.com/) beforehand or notified manually. It will be filled by merchant according to JSON schema during onboarding process and will be passed to Payment Provider as is.

members.name: key:value
members.doc: `key` of type string, `value` of type string

members.name: country
members.doc: The country in which the merchant will provide their services, in [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) format.

members.name: mode
members.doc: Connection mode. Identifies whether an account is live or for testing purposes.

members.name: credentials
members.doc: Set of key-value pairs. Free format of the fields that describes merchant credentials for Payment Provider. The format must be specified in  [Wix DevCenter](https://dev.wix.com/) beforehand or notified manually. It will be filled by merchant according to JSON schema during onboarding process and will be passed to Payment Provider as is.

docs.summary: Set of key-value pairs. Merchant credentials that will be used by Wix to make a payment on behalf of the merchant.

members.name: key:value
members.doc: `key` of type string, `value` of type string

members.name: credentials
members.doc: Set of key-value pairs. Merchant credentials that will be used by Wix to make a payment on behalf of the merchant.

members.name: accountId
members.doc: Merchant account ID. This must not be changed over the lifetime of their account.

members.name: mode
members.doc: Connection mode. Identifies whether an account is live or for testing purposes.

docs.summary: Set of key-value pairs. Payment Provider own credentials that were connected during the onboarding process.

members.name: key:value
members.doc: `key` of type string, `value` of type string

members.name: merchantCredentials
members.doc: Set of key-value pairs. Payment Provider own credentials that were connected during the onboarding process.

members.name: reason
members.doc: Reason for refund. Defined by the merchant.

members.name: mode
members.doc: Transaction mode. Identifies whether an account is live or for testing purposes.

members.name: refundAmount
members.doc:
Total amount to pay in a currency’s smallest unit. In the example it's a $10.00 payment.
The amount includes all extra charges that are described in the order object like shipping, taxes, etc.

members.name: status
members.doc: Refund status. Must be linked with [reason code](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/payment-provider/payment-provider-spi/reason-codes).

members.name: id
members.doc: Merchant order ID. Can be used by a merchant to correlate payment on Wix and on provider side.

members.name: totalAmount
members.doc:
Total amount to pay in a currency’s smallest unit. In example it's a $10.00 payment.
The amount includes all extra charges that are described in the order object like shipping, taxes, etc.

members.name: name
members.doc: Item name provided by the merchant.

members.name: description
members.doc: Item description provided by the merchant.

members.name: weightInKg
members.doc: Item weight in KG provided by the merchant.

members.name: tax
members.doc: Calculated taxes applyed for the full order.

members.name: fax
members.doc: Fax of a buyer in free form format.

members.name: address
members.doc:
Billing or delivery address line.
This field represents a street and house number concatenation.

members.name: id
members.doc: Specific Tax id for merchant country.

members.name: type
members.doc: Specific Tax type for merchant country.

members.name: buyerId
members.doc: Free format unique buyer identifier assigned by Wix.

members.name: successUrl
members.doc: URL destination to merchants site in case of successful payment.

members.name: errorUrl
members.doc: URL destination to merchants site in case of failed payment.

members.name: cancelUrl
members.doc: URL destination to merchants site in case of payment cancellation.

members.name: pendingUrl
members.doc: URL destination to merchants site in case of pending payment.

docs.summary: Set of key-value pairs. Payment Provider own credentials that were connected during the onboarding process.

members.name: key:value
members.doc: `key` of type string, `value` of type string

members.name: merchantCredentials
members.doc: Set of key-value pairs. Payment Provider own credentials that were connected during the onboarding process.

members.name: paymentMethod
members.doc:
Payment method supported by the payment provider.
These values will be displayed to the end-user upon checkout and will be passed to the payment provider to understand what payment method a user selected on the Wix side.
In case `paymentMethod:creditCard` field `paymentMethodData` will be initialized with `card`data.

members.name: mode
members.doc: Connection mode. Identifies whether an account is live or for testing purposes.

members.name: paymentMethodData
members.doc:
Payment method data information. Currently this data will be accessible in case `paymentMethod` equals to `creditCard`.
Please note that this call initiated in case you added *creditCard* as a payment method at [DevCenter](https://dev.wix.com).

members.name: redirectUrl
members.doc: URL of the `Payment Provider` where buyer will be forwarded in order to make a payment.

members.name: errorMessage
members.doc: `Payment Provider` error description with details of the decline

members.name: reasonCode
members.doc: `Wix` predefined reasonCode that specifies actual error.

members.name: redirect
members.doc: In case we have to redirect user to wallet page or 3D secure pages for credit cards.

members.name: transaction
members.doc: In case provider already got final transaction status.

docs.summary:
Possible values are:
  • OTHER
  • FRAUD
  • COMPLIANCE
  • DUPLICATE_PAYMENT
  • ABANDONED_PAYMENT
  • MERCHANT_REQUEST
  • BUYER_REQUEST

Possible values are:
  • APPROVED
  • PENDING
  • CANCELED
  • DECLINED

Possible values are:
  • APPROVED
  • PENDING
  • CANCELED
  • DECLINED
